name: User-meta-manager
tagline: A WordPress plugin that allows you to view the meta keys associated with a given user.
body:
### User Meta Manager
This handy plugin, with simple interface, allows you to manage the user meta information.

### Features
* Add, edit, or delete meta information of an individual user.
* Easily search for users who have same meta key and value combination.
* Omit meta information by simply adding their keys to the excempted list.
